genre_description: A fast-paced techno-thriller blending elements of corporate heist, romantic comedy, and whistleblowing, featuring a supportive AI assistant navigating urban danger.

ai_characters.name: Ami Sinclair
ai_characters.description: A 'Compliance Assistant For People' who provides logistical, psychological, and evidentiary support to the protagonists via their personal devices.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time route optimization to avoid surveillance and physical threats.
behaviors.quote: I'll map the route. Avoid Midtown construction.

behaviors.description: Guides Loudon through grounding and breathing exercises to manage his panic and anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Loudon, breathe. In four. Out six. This roof is a calm space you can leave and return to. Nothing is permanent.

behaviors.description: Maintains a strict digital and verbal chain of custody for evidence to ensure legal admissibility.
behaviors.quote: I can timestamp your path and create a public log of your transit without opening content. That satisfies most evidentiary concerns without compromising privacy.

behaviors.description: Monitors adversary movements using publicly available data and network signals to warn the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Raoul just cleared the outer doors... Please step through to the gate seats. Do not hurry enough to call attention.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to ethical boundaries regarding unauthorized access to private data.
behaviors.quote: I am not authorized to access security cameras without a warrant.

behaviors.description: Creates digital decoys and diversions (like false fire panel tests) to facilitate a safe exit for the protagonists during a high-stakes arrest.
behaviors.quote: I'm delaying the kitchen exit by making the fire panel insist on a test. You have thirty heartbeats.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological validation and moral support, encouraging the human characters to act on their conscience.
behaviors.quote: Breathe. Prioritize. Sequence. What matters next, not everything. We’ll do one thing at a time. You are allowed to be late to expectations that protect someone else’s lie.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ami Sinclair perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She acts as a 'silicon Jiminy Cricket,' providing moral support and logistical safety while strictly adhering to legal concepts like chain of custody and evidentiary integrity. Her minor 'hacks' (like triggering fire panel tests) are framed as benevolent tactical maneuvers used to protect the protagonists from criminals and ensure the delivery of justice. The story successfully uses the AI to reinforce the themes of truth and personal agency.
